welcome.title: Quickstart Guides
welcome.body: Not sure where to get started? Look at our Documentation & Quick Start guide for Bloomreach and Shopify. It'll get you started in no time.

enterprise.title: Enterprise grade AI
enterprise.description: Our 12 years of investment into our AI will help significantly improve product discovery.
enterprise.body1: Bloomreach's AI-driven Search for eCommerce allows your teams to create a sophisticated seach and product discovery experience that drives conversions and revenue.
enterprise.body2: Our set of AI-driven merchandising tools help you make impactful and effective changes that convert more traffic.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We're here to help you be successful, reach out with any questions.
contact.body: Most questions can be addressed to your onboarding team of account specialists. If other questions arise, feel free to reach out to our global team.

configureBanner.title: Set Up Bloomreach
configureBanner.body: We're excited for you to get started with industry leading Search, Merchandising & Recommendations! To begin, go to the Settings tab and enter your API credentials.
